title: Fix I18n Provider Error

requirements.text: Wrap the main App component with I18nProvider in frontend/src/main.tsx to resolve the 'useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider' error

quotes: Error: useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider

acceptanceCriteria: The I18nProvider component wraps the App component in main.tsx
The application loads without the I18n provider error
All existing i18n functionality continues to work correctly

constraints: Do not modify the existing I18nProvider implementation in frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx
Do not modify the existing useI18n hook in frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts
Preserve all existing authentication and query provider wrappers
